creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: neck piece has two brass button fasteners; scrolled applique on pounded indigo on blue silk, edged in red, green and white; bottom blue silk square bordered in black with nine irregularly shaped appliques and embroiderey, with sequins; black indigo lining
title: Baby Bib
